member.name: M:Xunit.Runners.UI.RunnerApplication.OnLaunched(Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.LaunchActivatedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when the application is launched normally by the end user. Other entry points will be used when the application is launched to open a specific file, to display search results, and so forth.
member.param: Details about the launch request and process.

member.name: E:Xunit.Runners.Utilities.FilteredCollectionView`2.ItemChanged
member.summary: Raised when one of the items selected by the filter is changed.
member.remarks: The sender is reported to be the item changed.
